name: dev-pipeline
description: Universal SDLC orchestrator. Runs a 5-phase discovery → plan → implement → test → review pipeline for any tech stack. Bundles 17 specialist agents and 11 domain-knowledge skills. Phase 2 produces visual, validated plans with built-in gap analysis — no external planning plugin required.

optionalDependencies.mermaid: Enables Mermaid diagram generation for implementation plans in Phase 2. If not installed, the visualization step is skipped gracefully.
